{
	email you@email.gnx
}
(mysnippet) {
	encode gzip
}
service1.tailnet.gnx {
	reverse_proxy service1:5000 {
		invalid
	}
}
service2.tailnet.gnx {
	respond 200 /
	# Comment
	reverse_proxy service2:5000 {
		health_uri /health
	}
	import mysnippet
}
service3.tailnet.gnx {
	respond 404 /
	basicauth /secret {
		user " a \ b"
	}
	respond / `<html>
		<body>Hello</body>
	</html>` 200
}
----------
{
	email you@email.gnx
}
(mysnippet) {
	encode gzip
}
service2.tailnet.gnx {
	respond 200 /
	reverse_proxy service2:5000 {
		health_uri /health
	}
	import mysnippet
}
service3.tailnet.gnx {
	respond 404 /
	basicauth /secret {
		user " a \ b"
	}
	respond / `<html>
		<body>Hello</body>
	</html>` 200
}
----------
[ERROR]  Removing invalid block: parsing caddyfile tokens for 'reverse_proxy': unrecognized subdirective invalid, at Caddyfile:9
service1.tailnet.gnx {
	reverse_proxy service1:5000 {
		invalid
	}
}
